1.content:
"Hey, guys! Catch!"

Zoro grunted as he tossed the large heavy chest up onto the Sunny's deck. They had been doing some diving for exercise while they rested in the harbour, and he had found it at the bottom. It had been some time since the crew had reunited, as well as gained three companions: the snake princess Boa Hancock, who had followed Luffy all the way from Amazon Lily; Fire Fist Ace, Luffy's adoptive brother; and Vivi Nefertari, the princess of Alabasta and longtime friend of the Strawhats.

"Whoa!" shouted Luffy, as ran over to chest; it was bigger than he was. "It's so huge!"

"Don't get your hopes up, Luffy." chuckled Sanji as he walked over. "Knowing Marimo it's probably full of junk."

Zoro growled and shot the cook a death glare. He was too tired after his swim to bother arguing, though, so he just flipped his middle finger at him and went back to wringing out his shirt.

"Well, what're we waiting for!?" announced Nami, Belli signs already in her eyes. "Open it, open it!"

"Calm down, Nami..." muttered Usopp as he picked the chest's lock. "You've gotta be careful with these things. They could be boobytrapped or anythi..." he was cut off by a loud click. "Got it."

Usopp and Luffy pushed the humongous lid back, revealing a huge variety of gold, jewels, antiques and pretty much everything else of value.

"Whoa!" shouted Chopper, his eyes widening in wonder. "So pretty!"

"It's so shiny..." gasped Brook. "Why, I think it's starting to hurt my eyes! ....except I don't have eyes! Yohohohohoho!"

"You've really outdone yourself, swordsman-san." stated Robin with a smile.

"Yeah, swordsman!" laughed Franky with a thumbs-up. "You did a SUPER job!"

"It is impressive, but I'm sure given the chance, Luffy would have done much better." Hancock remarked.

"Lady, you must not know Luffy very well." chuckled Ace as he reclined against the ship's railing.

"Mister Portgas, you shouldn't talk about your brother like that." scolded Vivi.

Luffy drooled as he stared at their newfound treasure. However, something quickly caught his eye.

"Hm? What's this?" he asked, as he plucked out some sort of gold amulet from the pile. It was round with a blue jewel in the middle; it didn't seem any different from the piles and piles of jewelry already in the chest. And yet, there was something about it...

Luffy didn't have time to ponder this any further. The amulet immediately reacted to his touch as the jewel glowed, before releasing a blinding light from it that engulfed the entire crew.

"Ah!" shouted Luffy as he attempted to shield his eyes.

"Luffy!" screamed Zoro. "What did you do!?"
1.title: The Beginning

choices: Instant for men, gradual for girls
Instant for Girls, gradual for men
11.title: They all swap genders

choices: They start a mad quest to find the amulet, it certainly couldn`t have gone far
111.content:
After a explosion of a blinding brightness that seemed to erase the world for a moment, the golden necklace flew away like shooting star, but only a few minutes later, when the Straw Hats and guests are finally able to see again, they get a good hold of what happened.

''GYAAAAAAAH!'' - shouts a lean red-headed male in too loose bikinis - ''WHAT DID YOU DO LUFFY!?!?''

''Ohohahahahaha, can you guys believe what just happened??'' - responded in the middle of a laught attack a plump bossomed brunette with a serious scar on its toned belly wearing Luffy`s attire.

''THAT CAN`T BE HAPPENING, YOU, IF IT WEREN`T THAT YOU`RE A LADY NOW I WOULD KICK YOUR FACE INSIDE OUT, IT FEELS LIKE OKAMA LAND ALL OVER AGAIN!!!'' - yelled a blond girl in business suit, her fringes over one eye, then he stops a moment, a though clicking in his mind, and looked down - ''YEEEEEEEEHEHEHE, I can't believ- and a blast of nose bleed jets out of her nose, making it imposible for her to check her own assets again for at least, a few seconds at a time.

''Heh, looking good Ero-cook'' - snickered the shirtless-and-shameless marimo head.

''WHO DO YOU THINK YOU AAAAAR--- Sanji trieed to fight, but words were tottaly lost when he saw Zoro`s exposed chest.

''Guys......what is happening? - asked a curvy furry cervine, wearing a volumous hat and shorts and a flush all over, trying to cover her boobs while looking wide-eyed at everyone.

''Argh, I guess the necklace we just saw did this, Chopper-san'' - said the blue haired cyborg, bulky yet curvaceous, wearing nothing but the usual speedos and her flashlight nipples to mantain people from looking directly into it.

''YOHOHOHOHO, I can`t believe this happened, how will ever anyone recognize me?!?" - said Brook, everyone stops a moment and look at the new (yet exactly the same skeleton with afro) 'girl'....and then...the mayhem is back! - HEY, THAT`S MEAN, LOOK, MY HIPS ARE BROADER! -and holts- looks like I need panties now...yohohohoho......'' *skeleton nose bleeds*

''I guess this could be fun, Luffy caused this after all'' - said a tall dark-haired man with a cowboy`s hat and big blue eyes, then noticing the flushed guy with blue hair, he asked - ''are you alright, Vivi-sama?"'

''How could this be all right?? I`m still the princess of Alabasta on license, ohhh, what will Pell say if he sees me like this?" - worried the new prince of Alabasta in egyptian tops.

''I just hope now I can get some attention from Luffy-samaaaaa'' - chanted the 6'4'' masc and elegant man with a Boa in his shoulders and dressed to impress. But before he could reach for the still laughting brunette, a torrent of fire shoots in front of him and from it forms a rather voluptuous and heavily freckled brunnete formed in front of him.

''Hello there'' - she said, mostly out of fun then flirting, Ace with her outstanding confidence was only powered by this new form - ''you come around here often?''

And as much as Hancock would loved to just petrify anyone who`d dare to hit on him at the moment`s notice, he just couldn`t-wouldn`t do it to Luffy-sama`s brother, now sister, he had to remember himself, with luck, they`d find the amulet again and reverse this, what would happen if the Amazon Queen became a man forever??


What happens now?
111.title: Instant

14.content:
"Urgh.." groaned Luffy as he shook his head. That light had given him a bit of a shock, but he was fine now...

...wait. Something wasn't right.

Luffy glanced down, and gasped to see himself wearing...
14.title: They all swap clothing

143.content:
Luffy choked in shock at seeing what he was now wearing. His vest now sported long sleeves, ending in frilly, lacy cuffs, and it barely reached the bottom of his chest where it joined with a pink belt, leaving his stomach completely exposed. His shorts, meanwhile, where completely gone and replaced by a very revealing red skirt adorned with the pattern of the Kuja. His usual comfy sandals were now red pumps with an impressive four inch heel, and every time he moved his head the jangling of snake-shaped earrings filled his ears. Finally, a white Marine jacket was draped across his shoulders like a cape.

"Why am I dressed like Hammock!?" shouted a shocked Luffy as he attempted to stand up, quickly grabbing onto a nearby railing as he wobbled in the unfamiliar shoes.

"What the hell is this!?" he heard the familiar deep voice of his swordsman roar. Walk over as best he could in his new feminine footwear, Luffy found he wasn't the only one with a makeover, as Zoro was now wearing...
143.title: Luffy the Snake Princess

1432.content:
Turning the corner, Luffy found he wasn't the only one who had received a clothing sex change, as he beheld the sight of Roronoa Zoro wearing the typical outfit of the ship's navigator, Nami.

His usual white polo shirt was replaced by a white t-shirt with a large blue stripe across the middle; the shirt plunged into a v-neck near the top, currently showing off Zoro's pecs instead of the usual cleavage. His muscular legs were almost completely bare, the usual black trousers replaced by an embarrassingly short orange skirt, one of Nami's favourites. Adorning the side of the skirt were metallic rings which jingled with the green-haired swordsman's every movement. Finally, his new footwear was a pair of orange high-heeled sandals. Not quite as high as the pumps Luffy currently sported, but still higher than the macho-man Zoro would be happy to be seen in.

"What the hell happened!?" scream Zoro as he looked himself over in horror, his face rapidly reddening with rage. As Luffy looked on, he noticed something about Zoro's legs; they were completely smooth. Since his rubber body meant he didn't grow much hair, Luffy didn't notice it on himself, but Zoro's legs were devoid not only of hair, but of the scars around his ankles from the events on Little Garden.

Both boys were snapped out of their trains of thought by a familiar, feminine laugh.

"Lookin' good there, Zoro!" laughed Nami, as she stepped forward to reveal herself wearing...
1432.title: "Cat Burglar" Zoro

14321.content:
Luffy and Zoro's jaws dropped as they saw Nami dressed in the outfit formerly belonging to their green-haired swordsman.

The outfit was simple but practical. The basic white shirt with black trousers, now seemingly tailored to fit her slender curves. Around her waist was Zoro's green sash and around her arm was his black bandana. Every one of her formerly dainty footsteps was acompanied by a loud CLOMP thanks to the heavy black boots she now wore. Finally, a familiar trio of swords hung from her hip.

"Hey!" roared Zoro as he stomped over to her, trying to look intimidating (which was much harder in a miniskirt and high heels). "What do you think you're doing wearing MY clothes!?"

"Excuse me, exactly whose clothes do you think YOU'RE wearing?" she snapped back, gesturing to his current outfit.

The two of them were cut off by a familiar, blond blur rushing between the two.

"Marimo, you leave Nami-swan alone!" snarled Sanji, his temper rising.

Zoro began to reply to the cook, until he noticed that he had been effected too. Sanji's usual black suit was replaced by...
14321.title: "Pirate Hunter" Nami

143211.content:
Sanji growled at Zoro angrily, willing to defend his Nami-swan even if it cost him his life. Unfortunately, he was much less intimidating considering he was wearing the usual outfit of the Straw Hat's closest companion, Vivi.

Instead of his usual black suit, Sanji was wearing a green button-up shirt with black diagonal lines across it. His legs were revealed by the white short-shorts he now wore, and his black shoes were replaced by white high heeled boots. His usual cigarette was missing.

Zoro glanced his rival up and down, before folding his arms. "And I'm supposed to be intimiated by a crossdresser?"

"Shut up!" roared Sanji, his teeth sharpening and his eye going white. "At least I'm not wearing a skirt, Marimokama!!"

"What did you call me?" bellowed Zoro, his hands flying to his sides to grab his swords, only to find the three pieces of Nami's Clima-Tact hanging from his skirt instead.

"Aw, is the big bad swordsman missing his swords?" teased Sanji, grinning. "What're you gonna do now, huh? Make it rain, and hope I catch a cold?"

"Hey!" snapped Nami as she smacked Sanji upside the head with Zoro's Ichimonji. "That's MY weapon you're making fun of!"

"Hoi, don't use me swords like that!" fumed Zoro.

"All of you, stop ARGUING!!" another voice chimed in, as the four pirates turned to see Vivi standing just off to the side. Predictably, she had been effected as well, and was now garbed in...
143211.title: Princess Sanji

15233.content:
How about this: Maybe their clothes don't change at all, but their minds do, so that they all think that they HAVE swapped clothes? Meaning that they all believe that their usual clothes, (which they are wearing), really belongs to someone else, making them all feel uncomfortable wearing their own clothes, (which they all think is someone elses clothes), and only feeling comfortable when they are wearing someone elses clothes, (which they all think is their own clothes), despite any differences in the size of the clothes, or otherwise.

For example; if Chopper and Nami believe that they have swapped clothes with each other, then Nami will believe that Chopper's clothes are really her clothes, (even though those clothes are much too small for her to wear properly), while Chopper would belive that Nami's clothes are really his clothes, (even though those clothes are much too big for him to wear properly), but they will want to switch clothes anyway, because they still think that they are wearing each others clothes.

155332.title: Something else

choices: Nami still has her mind and can still navigate.
Chopper examines each of the women back on the Sunny.
1553321.content:
The men of the Sunny were unchanged, their bodies, clothing, and minds all the same as they had been before the box was opened.

But for the women, a lot had changed.

Nami was now obese, a monument to gluttony and laziness. Her brown eyes glared at Luffy for opening the box and the new pig snout where her nose had been twitched just a bit as she oinked. Chopper guessed that she had to weigh over six hundred pounds.

Robin was muscular, an Amazonian goddess with a few odd touches. For one, she now possessed a cow's udder and tail. Bending down, she started to chew on some nearby grass, mooing in contentment.

Hancock was tiny, less than an inch tall to be precise. She had also developed a rather bad case of acne and had on a pair of suspenders and dorky looking shirt. She was being held by Vivi.

The Princess of Alabasta had gotten incredibly fat, not as big as Nami, but fat nonetheless. A rat's tail twitched above her mighty rear end and she had whiskers moving here and there jutting from her cheeks.

"Well, one thing's for sure," Zoro muttered. "We're going to need a bigger boat."
1553321.title: Randomize them!

choices: Minds changing along with their bodies.
155332212.content:
Luffy exclaims, "Woah, that was so cool! What happened?!" Luffy turns around and looks at the others while he holds the amulet. They're staring at him oddly. There are slight auras around the crew, them not noticing as they begin to change. Luffy holding the amulet is not being effected.... Despite this, he's as oblivious as ever as the crew begins to change in front of him, even when Nami's breasts start to get bigger and tighter against her bikini top, which is straining to hold her changing figure.

Do they notice that they're starting to change, or are the changes effecting their minds and making them think they were always like this?
155332212.title: Gradual

choices: Luffy doesn't notice/doesn't care, continue to when they run into another crew?
1553322122.content:
The male crew members began expanding before Luffy's eyes. Zoro's hair started growing. Chopper started changing into another animal... a cow, possibly? Franky shrank into a feminine cyborg before swelling. The men seemed to be changing faster then the women: Each suddenly sprouting boobs, hair, eyelashes, and nails elongating, voices changing to a higher pitch, meanwhile their penises, unfortunately, shrank into oblivion and transformed into the womanly counterpart.

Not to say that the women weren't changing. Nami's breasts slowly growing, ass growing, mind changing. Vivi, Robin, and Hancock are the same, each ending up with massive boobs, a large ass, a few inches of height, and longer hair. And a constant theme became snapping: Bras, belts, panties, boxers, underwear; anything the crew had been wearing snapped off to fit the new proportions: The entire crew had become bare naked as they continued to swell in curves

Lets now look at what the men had become: Tough Zoro was now Zora, a tom boy. Sanji had turned into Sanjelique, a hardcore lesbian. Franky was still Franky, but now was a much more womanly cyborg. Chopper had become Chopara, and was now a cow/human mix with the largest pair of breasts the crew had ever seen. Brooke's name was still Brooke, but he had become a slenderer, more womanly skeleton, and his afro had become shoulder length hair. Usopp had become Usoppa, a shy woman that was scared by everything.

At the end of the transformations, this is how the crew looked: Luffy, normal as always, Nami with a ridiculously large pair of JJ breasts and a pretty chunky ass, Vivi with EE breasts and a MASSIVE ass, each cheek the size of a beach ball, Hancock maintaining an hourglass figure with GG boobs and watermelon sized ass. The rest of the crew fell into each of these categories: Nami, Franky, and Chopara had become top heavy while Vivi, Zora, and Franky had become the crew's bottom heavy members, and finally, Hancock, Sanjelique had become the hourglasses. Brooke, only a skeleton, had gained no curves, unfortunately.
1553322122.title: Minds changing along with their bodies.

15533221221.content:
Luffy's eyes go wide: "Oh, wow! Do it again! Do it again!" The girls just look at each other confused, wondering what he means.

Nami calmly shakes her head: "Do what again, you doofus?" She giggles at his silly look. "We haven't even done 'it' today. Though, we're certainly in the 'attire' for it right now. If you want, I won't even charge you for it, since it's you."

Sanjelique excitedly exclaims, "May I join in, Nami? I get both pleasures that way, you and Luffy!"

Nami sweatdrops, "I said it's free for LUFFY. For you, it'll cost ya."

Sanjelique just pouts, "Awww..."

The crew all still had their natural abilities, such as Devil's Fruit powers, combat abilities, Nami's navigation, etc., but they all were suffering from massive IQ decreases. The transformation basically made the rest of the crew smoking hot bimbos. Which made communication very difficult. Alright, on with the story!

155332222211.content:
As the flash died down,everyone looked at each other but nothing happened.

"What should be that for?"asked Zoro

"I have no idea"answered Ruffy

"Ruffy could you give me the amulet please maybe I can find out what happened?"asked Robin

"Sure"said Ruffy giving Robin the amulet.

"mmmmmmm"said Robin reading the hieroglyphics of the amulet


"It says that everyone who dares to take this amulet from it's place will as punishment lose his/her human form including his/her companions for this crime."said Robin

"How stupid is that ,just another stupid joke of a curse which doesn't exist."said Nami

All agreed but Robin said "I don't think so,the devil fruits show us that nothing is impossible.But we will see if something happens and if we will do something against it.Till then let's celebrate our reunion after two years."

"Yeah agreed everyone."and so they celebrated.

Who will be the first one transforming?

1553322222221.title: Yes

choices: She tested her new abilities out.
15533222222211.content:
The light slowly faded away . ' What just happened? ' , said Luffy confused. ' That amulet was cursed! ' , said Zoro. Suddenly Nami walked to Luffy and shouted, ' You fool, you don't just touch things without me inspecting it first! ' . She slapped luffy so hard that it could be heard a 100 miles away. ' Why did you have to slap me?! ' , luffy said. Nami wanted to pull her hand away, but to her surprise her hand was stuck to his face. ' My hand is stuck! ', she shouted trying to pull away. Everyone rushed closer to try and pull Nami and Luffy apart. It was no use , on closer inspection they saw that her hand and Luffy's cheek had become one. Suddenly Luffy and Nami both began to glow. Nami's hand began to move deeper into Luffy's face . Nami and Luffy began to move closer and closer. The closer they moved to each other the brighter their glow became. The glow eventually became blinding. Their bodies slowly merged together and was accompanied by their screams. Until suddenly Nami and Luffy stopped screaming and the light slowly faded away.

Instead of two figures there was now one figure left behind by the light. There stood a female figure which actually looked more like Nami , but had a few alterations that belonged to Luffy. She had orange her with brown eyes , and a more curvy ripped body than Nami. There was a scar with two stitches underneath her left eye and a large X shaped scar on her chest and a blue tattoo on her left shoulder . She had on a straw hat, green and white bikini halter top, tight low-rider blue shorts , a yellow sash tied around his waist and orange high-heeled sandals.

Everyone stared at this new figure . The figure began checking herself out and said, ' I can get use to this . ' . ' Who are you ? ' , Usopp asked a bit nervous. The figure looked at Usopp and said, ' It's me ,Nami. ' . ' It's clear what happened here, Nami's conscious overpowered Luffy's, because she is more ... let's say intelligent . ' , Robin said. ' So what do we call you ? ' , Zoro asked. ' Lumi... Naffy... ' , Usopp began guessing. ' Just call me Nami . ' , she said smiling.
15533222222211.title: Luffy and Nami

info.brief_description: The Straw Hat pirates find a strange object that causes them to experience some changes
info.description:
The Straw Hats undergo changes. Physical, mental, any kind really. Just keep things consistant.
The changes don't always need to affect everyone, either one or a few of them.

Also note, that this story will patially disregard certain aspects of canon, sucj as taking place before the time skip, as well as having the whole crew together and having Vivi, Boa Hancock and Ace present

No sex
No killing off characters
No ending the story
Please try to have good grammar and such

And of course, have fun!
